Using @townsapp to trade directly on @HyperliquidX within a shared chat feels very different from the usual terminal-style setup. Instead of switching between tabs and dashboards, everything happens where the conversation already is.

I literally typed something like ‚Äú/trade long BNB 50x with $400‚Äù in the chat, and the trade executed. Positions, fills, and P&L update live in the same thread, making it feel social and easy to follow, especially when you‚Äôre trading alongside others.

üåå Finora AI Analysis for $HYPE  #HYPEUSDT .P | 15m  - Price is currently bullish after a strong impulsive move upward and is consolidating just below the recent swing high. - If the price holds above 26.114 and shows a bullish reversal candle or a strong bounce after a minor dip, I expect a continuation upward toward 26.500 and potentially 26.700. - For a long trade, I‚Äôd wait for a bullish price action confirmation around 26.114 or slightly lower near 26.000, targeting first 26.500 and then 26.700, with stop-loss below the nearest swing low or strong bullish structure. - If price loses momentum and breaks below 26.000 with strong bearish candles, downside targets open up to 25.580 and 25.052, but my main expectation remains bullish as long as price is above 26.000. - My view would turn bearish only if we see a decisive close below 25.580, with strong selling pressure and no bullish reaction at the supports. - This is not investment advice, just an educational analysis.  üìä Get detailed free analysis of any coin on any timeframe you want.
